SA03n2957:1093: santo ye guṇā bhagavata eva teṣāṁ sragmālā |

SA03n2957:1099: puṇyabhājāṁ bodhisattvānāṁ mukhāmbhojāllabdha udaya utpattiryayā sā tathārūpiṇyapi sarasvatī dīpyamānākhilālaṁkāraśrlāghinī |
SA03n2957:1102: san śobhano guṇaḥ sūtraṁ yasyāṁ tādṛśī sragasyā astīti sragviṇī |
SA03n2957:1108: bhaṅgaṁ nītāste pañcabāṇasya bāṇāḥ śānto dveṣāgnirmohajāḍyaṁ nirastam |
SA03n2957:1109: nātha trailokyānugrahavyagramūrte saṁpat saṁprāptā vaiśvadevī tvayaiva || 55 ||
SA03n2957:1114: viśve ca te devāśca teṣāmiyaṁ vaiśvadevī saṁpattvayaiva saṁprāptā nānyena |
SA03n2957:1116: yatastvayā pañcabāṇasya te bāṇā bhaṅga nītāḥ prāpitāḥ |
SA03n2957:1122: atra ca vināpi tena cārtho labhyate |
SA03n2957:1128: na hi svayamasiddhaḥ parārtha sādhayitumadhīṣṭa iti |
SA03n2957:1129: athavā yadi rāgādayo bhagavataḥ prahīṇāstadā tvatpresattvārtha hānirityāha |
SA03n2957:1133: bāṇāḥ pañca te cātra bhaṅga nītāḥ ||
SA03n2957:1146: atidhairyācca ambhorāśeḥ samudrasya yatiṁ saṁyamamācāraṁ dhatse |
SA03n2957:1147: tathā jaladharamālāyā līlāṁ dhatse iti yojyam |
SA03n2957:1151: sā cāsau saddharmāmbudhārā ca tasyā savātāstaiḥ |
SA03n2957:1155: vṛttapakṣe 'mbhorāśeryatimati jagatyāṁ jaladharamālā dhatta iti saṁbandhanīyam |
SA03n2957:1158: tava puraḥ paramottamasaṁmatāḥ pratibhayā vikalāḥ prativādinaḥ |
SA03n2957:1163: he parama tava purata uttamatvena saṁmatā api prativādino bṛhaspatyādayaḥ |
SA03n2957:1166: drutaṁ vā vilambitaṁ vā yaduccāritaṁ vacaḥ |
SA03n2957:1174: te'pi yadi drutaṁ vilambitaṁ vā vacanamuccārayanti |
SA03n2957:1175: tadā tadapi bahu manyante mṛtādvaraṁ drubalateti nyāyāt |
SA03n2957:1185: tritayamapi jagat pavitrayantī bhavataḥ kīrtiḥ prabhavati |
SA03n2957:1200: harati nitāntamiyaṁ tava kīrtiḥ kṛtihṛdayāni dayānijavāsa |
SA03n2957:1201: prasavacayena citeva samantāddiśi diśi kundalatā dalatālam || 59 ||
SA03n2957:1205: yathā samantāddalatā vikasatā prasavacayena puṣpanivahena citā vyāptā kundalatā |
SA03n2957:1207: diśi diśi kṛtināṁ sukṛtināṁ hṛdayāni harati |
SA03n2957:1209: iyamanantaroditā tava kīrtirdiśi diśi samantāt prasarantī paṇḍitahṛdayāni nitāntaṁ harati ||
SA03n2957:1220: dhṛtā dharmadhātuvāgīśvarasya buddhasya līlā yena sa eṣa ko'pi kṛpāsamudraḥ |
SA03n2957:1223: upāttaḥ saṁbhṛtaḥ śobhānāṁ samavāyo yena tathā |
SA03n2957:1228: vṛttapakṣe dalamardha pādānāṁ tatra yatyā prāptaḥ san śobhāsamavāyo yena sa tathā |
SA03n2957:1240: rūcāṁ cayān tavaiva kāyakiraṇanikarāṇāṁ kāntyā prakarṣeṇa vikiratīva cchurayatīva |
SA03n2957:1242: viyattaraṅgiṇyāstaralataraṅgāṇāmiva rūk kāntiryeṣāṁ teṣāmapi viśadatvāt vicchinnavisāritvācca |
SA03n2957:1244: athavā tava daśāntare yathoktarūcāṁ cayān pravikirati sati |
SA03n2957:1251: manohārihārāvalīramyamīdṛk kka te nātha rūpaṁ surūpādhirāja |
SA03n2957:1257: manohāriṇyā hārāvalyā ramyaṁ tava kkedṛśaṁ rūpam |
SA03n2957:1258: surūpādhirājetyanena rūpābhimānivinayanārtha tādṛṅ mahārājalīlādinirmāṇaṁ darśitamiti darśayati |
SA03n2957:1259: kka cātiśa yaṁ durdāntasattvānāṁ praśamarthaṁ sfurantaścalanto bhīmā bhayānakā bhūṣārthaṁ ye bhujaṅgāstaiḥ prayātamāśritaṁ yamāryādirūpam |
SA03n2957:1272: suṣṭhu rūcirā mallikāyāḥ samaye yauvanadaśāyāṁ sevyā pratinavā abhinavā yā mālā yad vā surūcirā mallikā kāle sevyā yā pratinavā mālā mallikāyā eva sā yasyā asti mūrteḥ |
SA03n2957:1273: saiva taveyaṁ mūrtiḥ kasya na cittaṁ harati |
SA03n2957:1277: sa eva vā bhūśā yasyāḥ sā ||
SA03n2957:1283: tava nātha paraṁ yadi kāntisudhājaladhau śramamujzhati zhātkṛtini |
SA03n2957:1290: jagannayanaṁ tava kāntireva sudhājaladhistarimañzhātkṛtini śramamāyāsaṁ paramujzhati |
SA03n2957:1295: śubhaṁ manoharaṁ rūpaṁ tasya nirūpaṇe lampaṭakaṁ sat paritaḥ samantādaṭatītyarthaḥ |
SA03n2957:1334: yo bhavantamapi vāgīśvaraṁ śrayañjaḍā mandā uddhatā vikṣiptā gatirmatiryasya sa tathābhūtaḥ san |
SA03n2957:1344: locanotsavavidhāsu tanubhṛtāṁ candra vartma samupaiti bhavabhidām || 67 ||
SA03n2957:1349: tava prasādena samudīrṇaṁ samṛddhaṁ yacchubhaṁ tatsāmarthyāt kṛtijanaḥ sukhamevākaṣṭenaiva bhavabhidāmāryāṇāṁ vartma mārgaṁ samupaiti prāpnoti |
SA03n2957:1365: sukhaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ ca tayoratiśaya ādiryeṣāṁ sukhamādyādīnāṁ teṣāṁ hetu jātairapi |
SA03n2957:1370: tava pādāśrayeṇa labdho buddheḥ sāro balaṁ yaiste tathābhūtā yasmāt |
SA03n2957:1384: tava caraṇayoḥ paricaraṇe parīṣṭau rūciryeṣāṁ teṣāṁ sukhaṁ yathā bhavati tathā kimapyadbhutaṁ kṛtināṁ rūpaṁ svarūpaṁ kṛtitvamudayati jagatyām |
SA03n2957:1386: nikhilasya malapaṭalasya vigamāddīpro dīpanaśīlaḥ prathimā pṛthutvaṁ yeṣām |
SA03n2957:1388: athavā nikhilamalapaṭalavigamadīpraṁ ca tatprathimaguṇena mahitamati ceti karmadhārayaḥ ||
SA03n2957:1399: iha jagati mañjughoṣa iti prathitaḥ khyāto jinamānasamevaikā utkṛṣṭā yā nalinī tatra kalahaṁsa iva kalahaṁso vo yuṣmān avyāt |
SA03n2957:1402: tathā ca rabhasaḥ kaladhautaṁ svarṇe rūpye iti |
SA03n2957:1403: paṭvī yā bhāratī saiva varaṭā haṁsīti tayā satatānugamāt |
SA03n2957:1405: nalinyāṁ kalapradhāno'pi haṁsa iha jagati mañjurghoṣo 'syeti mañjughoṣa iti prathitaḥ |
SA03n2957:1407: uttamaceṣṭaḥ kaladhautaṁ rūpyaṁ tadvat śuddhavapuśca bhavati ||
SA03n2957:1414: vicchedastriṣu yadi duḥsaheṣvamīṣu kleśeṣu sfuṭamaṇuśo 'pi duṣkaraḥ syāt |
SA03n2957:1415: prāpyeta kka nu khalu nātha mūrtirīdṛk trailokye nayanamanaḥ praharṣiṇīha || 71 ||
SA03n2957:1420: amīṣu rāgadveṣamoheṣu triṣu duḥsaheṣu kleśeṣu sfuṭaṁ vyaktaṁ yo vicchedo vigamaḥ sa yadi duṣkaraḥ syāt |
SA03n2957:1423: aṇuśo 'pi sūkṣmapracārāṇāmapi yadi vicchedo duṣkaraḥ kartumaśakyaḥ syāttadeha trailokye īdṛgbhagavato mūrtiḥ kka nu khalu prāpyeta naiva prāpyetetyarthaḥ |
SA03n2957:1425: nayanaṁ ca manaśca te praharṣayituṁ śīlaṁ yasyāḥ sā tathā |
SA03n2957:1433: bhavādṛśāṁ vapuṣi ca kāntisaṁtatiḥ samīkṣyate yadi rūcireyamīdṛśī || 72 ||
SA03n2957:1437: iyamīdṛśī rūcirā kānteḥ saṁtatirbhavādṛśāṁ mahābodhisattvānāmeva vapuṣi paramīkṣyate |
SA03n2957:1438: apāṁ viratiṁ vigamaṁ vidhāya yadi kadācittasmin |
SA03n2957:1441: vṛttapakṣe 'tijagatyāṁ payonidhau viratiṁ vidhāya iyamīdṛśī rūcirā samīkṣyate ||
SA03n2957:1451: mandradhvānaiḥ gambhīranirghoṣairamṛtadhārāḥ pravacanapravāhān manohara muccaistvayi muñcati |
SA03n2957:1452: ata eva prīṇitabhavye yā yatiścaritaṁ visfurati saiva yatirvarṣā mbhodaṁ vyaktatayā sfuṭamanveti |
SA03n2957:1458: vṛttapakṣe rūcirāyā yā yatiranantaroktā caturthe saivātijagatyāṁ mattamayūraṁ vṛttamanveti ||
SA03n2957:1467: tvayi trijagatāṁ pramodasya janane janananimittaṁ janake vā |
SA03n2957:1468: madhāviva vasanta iva vartamānasyotpalataroḥ ketanendīvaravṛkṣasya latā śākhā jayati |
SA03n2957:1471: tathā madhumattānāṁ bhṛṅgāṇāṁ raveṇa mañju bhāṣituṁ śīlaṁ yasyāḥ sā tathā |
SA03n2957:1473: tatra cotpalataroḥ śākhā netrakamanīyasumanobhirūllasitā tanmakarandapānamattamadhukarazhāṁkāraiḥ manoharavyāhāriṇīva bhavati ||
SA03n2957:1482: manyāmahe jinanayābharaṇaṁ tavaiva vṛttaṁ vasantatilakaṁ navacūtameva || 75 ||
SA03n2957:1486: yathā navacūtaṁ vasantasya tilakamalaṁkārabhūtaṁ tathā tavaiva vṛttaṁ caritraṁ jinanayasyābharaṇaṁ manyāmahe |
SA03n2957:1490: sarvātiśāyinastavaiva ye guṇāstairnirbharaṁ labdho modo yaiḥ |
SA03n2957:1491: cūtamapi sarvātiśāyibhirnijaiḥ saurabhādi guṇairnirbharalabdhamodāni yāni mahuvratakulāni tairvandivṛndairivopagīyamānam |
SA03n2957:1504: vādikuladaivata mamandaṁ yathā bhavati tathā abhivande |
SA03n2957:1506: bhagavata eva saṁmukhaṁ valan mukhaṁ yasya tasya mṛgāhipateḥ pṛṣṭhārūdamatigādadayamatiśayitakṛpam |
SA03n2957:1510: varṇasya saundaryeṇa hema bandhuritaṁ kānteśca himapādaścandra ityarthaḥ ||
SA03n2957:1514: tathā ca jayadevaḥ 'siṁhalalitaṁ ca kathitaṁ bhajasanogau ' iti ||
SA03n2957:1528: praśamitaḥ praśamaṁ nītaḥ sakalaḥ prapañco grāhyagrāhakādi vikalpo yaḥ |
SA03n2957:1530: tābhyāṁ yathāsaṁkhyaṁ prasarantāvamalau yau dhīsamādhī tāveva sudhā tāṁ juṣamāṇasya ||
SA03n2957:1543: tava kkacidvajrabhairavādyavasthāviśeṣe bhujaparighāṇāṁ dordaṇḍānāmāvaliḥ saṁhatirativiṣamā vilasati |
SA03n2957:1547: pratibhayaṁ bhayaṁkaraṁ vapuryeṣāmakarūṇaṁ yaccaritaṁ tasya kṛpayā praśamanavidhaye ||
SA03n2957:1559: duṣprāpāhāryaṁ padamabhilaṣatāṁ tacca tvabhakteranyā varada na digasaṁbādhā || 79 ||
SA03n2957:1569: tāṁ ca viṣayebhyo rūpādibhyaḥ pañcakāmaguṇebhyo viratimabhilaṣatāṁ śrāvakagotrāṇāṁ na kevalam |
SA03n2957:1575: teṣu viratimabhilaṣatāṁ kavīnāṁ śakkarībhūṣaṇā asaṁbādhā nāma ||
SA03n2957:1579: bhavataḥ kalāṁ kimapi saṁyatairindriyaiḥ kkacidādarastimitadhīryadi dhyāyati |
SA03n2957:1580: acirāt svayaṁ varayatīyamenaṁ janaṁ vasudhā dhruvaṁ jaladhiśakkarībhūṣaṇā || 80 ||
SA03n2957:1585: ādareṇa stimitā vikṣepābhāvānniścalā dhīryasya tathābhūtaḥ san bhavataḥ kalām acalādyavasthāṁ dhyāyati |
SA03n2957:1587: tadā acirāt dhruvaṁ niścitamenaṁ janaṁ vasudhā svayamaprārthitā varayati svayaṁvaratvenopatiṣṭhata iti yāvat |
SA03n2957:1589: jaladhiḥ śakkarīva śakkarī mekhalā sā bhūṣaṇaṁ yasyāḥ |
SA03n2957:1610: te tvayā nirdhatumapi tāsāmeva kāntyā kamramiva |
SA03n2957:1611: yat kila niḥśeṣeṇa dhvastaṁ tat kāntaṁ na bhavatītīvaśabdaḥ |
SA03n2957:1614: bhagavataśca viraktatvādamarayoṣita eva bhagavatkāntisaṁdarśanāt kamramiva tadvibhrati ||
SA03n2957:1616: vṛttapakṣe 'tiśakkaryā pañcāśākṣareṇa cchandasā yo bandhastena sāramutkṛṣṭamanaṅgavijṛmbhitaṁ nāma |
SA03n2957:1626: yasyā bhagavattanoraṅgeṣu avayaveṣvanupamatvena ramaṇīyā bhaṅgirbhaktiḥ kartrī udārāṇi mahānti bhagavata eva yānyaśeṣāṇi yamāryādirūpāṇi hariharā dirūpaviśeṣā vā |
SA03n2957:1631: akhaṇḍā yā ākhaṇḍaleṣvāsasya śakradhanuṣo lakṣmīstasyā vijayastasya yat paramaṁ dhāma sthānaṁ tasya vyāmā cāsau rūk ca vyāmaprabhā tanmālā yasyā asti sā tathā |
SA03n2957:1640: bhaṇati mudā pratīṣṭajinabhāra bhāratī svamahimakāminī tava sabhāsu madrakam || 83 ||
SA03n2957:1644: pratīṣṭo 'numato jinasya bhāraḥ parārthabhāro yena sa saṁbodhyate |
SA03n2957:1646: kāmayate ajā noyate'taḥ sā bhāratī tava sabhāsu madrakaṁ rāgaviśeṣaṁ bhaṇati |
SA03n2957:1648: avikalaḥ samastālastena śālī kalo 'vyaktamadhuro yasyāḥ sā kākalī |
SA03n2957:1650: saiva ravastena vyatikarā miśrā vā vallakī vīṇā tayā valitaṁ cārū pañcamaṁ sthānaṁ yayā sā ||
SA03n2957:1662: he nātha tava avasthāviśeṣe durgatimārgamahārgalo bhuja eva tarūḥ sajjanaviśrāmabhūtatvāt jayati |
SA03n2957:1667: evaṁbhūtaṁ śṛṅkhalajālaṁ yattannibhamaṅgadaṁ keyūraṁ tena bhūṣitaḥ |
SA03n2957:1668: tathā prakṛṣṭo mado yasya sa cāsau manmathaśca tasya nirmathanaḥ |
SA03n2957:1671: vṛttapakṣe ihāpi vibhaktivipariṇāmena saṁbandhādatiśakkarībandhasāraḥ sugatapriyo nāma |
SA03n2957:1680: tava varavijayasamupacitayaśasaḥ śriyamanuharati hi śaradi śaśikalā || 85 ||
SA03n2957:1685: tava varāṇāṁ suraśreṣṭhānāṁ vijayena samupacitaṁ yadyaśastasya śriyam |
SA03n2957:1689: bhavaśirasi saṁsāramastake mahito guṇamahimā tavaiva yasmādbhavatīti tām |
SA03n2957:1691: śaśikalāpi bhavasya maheśvarasya śirasi vartamānā mahitaguṇamahimno bhūrāśrayaḥ |
SA03n2957:1707: paṭuparimalamilitasya madhukarayūno bhramaṁ sahate yaḥ śitisugato 'kṣobhyastasya samucitaṁ vardhitaṁ sukhaṁ yayā |
SA03n2957:1708: tasyaiva sākṣāttatra suparimala yogāt sā tathā |
SA03n2957:1712: sā ca raseṣu ṣaṭsu layo bhaṅgastadvatī ||
SA03n2957:1716: na yatipadamayasi yadatidayadhiyaḥ prathayasi jagati ca parahitakṛtinaḥ |
SA03n2957:1721: atikrāntā dayāṁ dhīryeṣāṁ tān prati yadyasmāt |
SA03n2957:1722: na yatīnāṁ śāntarūpāṇāṁ padamayasi gacchasi saumyasvabhāvaṁ vihāya krodharūpeṇa damayasyeveti bhāvaḥ |
SA03n2957:1723: yacca parahite kṛtinaḥ prajñāvato jagati prathayasi vistārayasi |
SA03n2957:1724: itistasmāt himacayarūcirbhavato guṇānāṁ nikaro viyadākāśaṁ janayati |
SA03n2957:1748: tava guṇagaṇasya parimitimudadhiṣu vartamāno maṇinikaraḥ kathamiva samiyāt sametu |
SA03n2957:1752: udadhiṣviti bahuvacananirdeśāt ekaśeṣādvā praticatuṣkaṁ yati lakṣito draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA03n2957:1769: kiṁ bata nikhilasya jagata ucitā paribhuk paribhogastasyā avani tadvat |
SA03n2957:1772: śiśuralpā matistayā kalito yaḥ sakalo janastasya bahuvidhaṁ vimatervipratipatterlalitaṁ yattasya vidhibhiḥ ||
SA03n2957:1780: prati jaḍadhiyamiha samadhikagurūdaya mṛdumatirapi tava śubhamayasamudaya |
SA03n2957:1785: jaḍadhiyaṁ prati lakṣyīkṛtya samadhikagurvī dayā yasya tasyāmantraṇam |
SA03n2957:1789: iha jagati mṛdumatirapi jano jinakuvalayaṁ muditādibhūvalayaṁ tavāviṣamabharamadurvahabharamiti kalayati |
SA03n2957:1793: tacca ḍalayoraikyāt jaladhiṁ prati yamo yatirasyāstīti tathā ||
SA03n2957:1806: tathā ca 'ārṣabhaṁ siṁhanādaṁ nadāmi' iti prayogaḥ |
SA03n2957:1810: vyomni vikīrṇā kīrtireva madaparimalasya kalanayā āghrāṇena bhaṅgurastuṅgavādimadakalakarinikaro yasmāt |
SA03n2957:1811: gandhagajasya hi madagandhamāghrāyānye mattā api kariṇo lakṣyante |
SA03n2957:1818: ravāḥ svarāste ca sapta tatra yatiryasya tattathāḥ ||
SA03n2957:1822: kastvayi baddhavarmaṇi jagaddhitadhānadhiyā nirvihatapratijña paritāpakaṇaḥ kka cana |
SA03n2957:1827: jagaddhitasya dhānamādhānam taddhitadhānadhiyā baddhavarmaṇi baddhavīryasaṁnāhe tvayi kka cana parārthaviṣaye paritāpasya kaṇo lavo'pi |
SA03n2957:1833: yad yasmānmāravadhūjanasya kamanīyakapolatale navā yā pattrabhaṅgaracanā tatrālasa eva karo vartate mārasya jitatvāt ||
SA03n2957:1839: nirūpamaramyarūpa jinajātadṛśvano 'ṣṭau madayati te'dhikaṁ vidhutaśoka lokapālān |
SA03n2957:1846: te tava jinajātadṛśvanaḥ sugatasamūhaṁ dṛṣṭavata iyaṁ kumārī līlāṣṭau lokapālānmadayati harṣayati |
SA03n2957:1853: sā cāsau puṇḍarīkasya vyāghrasya nakharājiśceti tābhyāṁ rājiteti |
SA03n2957:1859: guṇānāmatyaṣṭiḥ kathamiha mamevāstu jagatāmiti cchandaḥ svairaṁ pariṇatimavāpattava tathā |
SA03n2957:1867: cchando 'bhilāṣastava svairaṁ śanaiḥ pariṇatiṁ paripākaṁ tathāvāpat agamat yathāsmin jagati nikhilānāṁ sukhānāṁ śākhā pāramitā tasyāḥ śikharaṁ paryantastadvatī guṇānāṁ vibhūtiḥ tvayyeva bhagavati samudbhūtā |
SA03n2957:1872: vṛttapakṣe 'tyaṣṭiḥ saptadaśākṣaraṁ cchandastathā pariṇatimavāpadyathā śikhariṇī samudbhūtā |

SA03n2957:2416: nṛtyato hi śramo bhavati sa cānilollāsitena varṣatā payodenāpohyata iti bhagavato'pi tathaivotprekṣyate |
SA03n2957:2419: vineyaviśeṣamanujighṛkṣoḥ khalu bhagavataḥ kṛpākelinirbharatāṇḍavārambhe 'tyadbhutodbhaṭavikaṭabhujadaṇḍamaṇḍalaprabhavaprabhañjanajavairūjjṛmbhitaḥ sasaṁrambhamambhobhṛdakāṇḍapracaṇḍavāridhārāndhakārārabdhadurdinaḥ saṁvartaḥ saṁvṛtta iti cetasi trāsamāntanvānaḥ pīḍayatyāhatya jagattrayaṁ paryante tu parahitaikapariṇāmamadhura eva ||
SA03n2957:2427: pratipadamiha jātaśuddheḥ samādhestrayasyākṣarasyābhisaṁvardhanādantyarūpaspṛśaḥ samadhigamavaśājjayatyāryavaryaiḥ prabhūtapramodaiḥ pragītaḥ prabhāvaprakarṣastava |
SA03n2957:2434: prabhūtapramodairāryavaryaiḥ pragītastava prabhāvaprakarṣa iha jagati jayati |
SA03n2957:2440: yasya ca pragītasvabhāvasyānumodanāvādena yatsārāviṇaṁ saṁbhūya ravaṇaṁ tatrātṛptacittaiḥ surairvādyamānāḥ śramaṁ viśrāmaṁ na yānti |
SA03n2957:2442: arṇavasya vyālā iva kārṣṇyāt ye jīmūtāsteṣāṁ manojñadhvanitvena līlākarā ye uddāmaśaṅkhādayaste ||
SA03n2957:2444: vṛttapakṣe iha caṇḍavṛṣṭiprapāte 'ntyānāṁ trayāṇāma kṣarāṇāṁ gurūlaghukrameṇa yadrūpaṁ tatspṛśastrayasyākṣarasya pratipadaṁ pratipādamabhisaṁvardhanāt |
SA03n2957:2445: arṇārṇavavyālajīmūtalīlākaroddāmaśaṅkhāayo ye te daṇḍakabhedāḥ śramaṁ viśrāmaṁ paryantaṁ na yānti aparyantā iti yāvat |
SA03n2957:2454: daśabalatanayavargāgrimeṇa tvayā nātha nirmāthiduḥkhāpahena stutena pracita iti śubharāśirmahān yastataḥ stājjanaughe samṛdhiḥ samagre'pi saiva || 121 ||
SA03n2957:2462: tribhuvanasya śamo nirvāṇaṁ tadvidhānārtha nirvāṇanīvṛnnivaraṇaṁ yasya |
SA03n2957:2463: tathā tamālākṛtau śyāme bhavārau bhagavatyakṣobhye āttā bhaktiryena sa tathā |
SA03n2957:2468: iti yathoktakramastutena yo mayā mahān śubharāśiḥ pracitastataḥ śubharāśerbhagavato yā samṛddhiḥ saiva janaudhe 'pi samagre stādbhavatu ||
SA03n2957:2474: daśabalatanayavargasyāgrimeṇa jyeṣṭhena mayā gaṅgadattena nirvāṇaṁ nayatīti nirvāṇanīrvṛttamāleyaṁ kṛtā |
SA03n2957:2478: samṛddhiḥ saiveti yaivāntyākṣaratrayasya caṇḍavṛṣṭiprapāte saṁtatyā vṛddhiḥ saiva pracite'pi |
SA03n2957:2483: tena vakṣyamāṇe 'pi pravṛttākhye pracitavadakṣaratrayasya vṛddhau nāmāntaram ||
SA03n2957:2492: na kevalaṁ janaughe 'pi saiva samṛddhiḥ stādahamapi tribhuvanasya paramopakāra evaikaṁ kṛtyaṁ tatra pravṛttaścareyaṁ janmaśitayā tāvadyāvadeko'pi sattvo na mukta ityāryamañjuśriya iva praṇidhānaṁ vidhatte |
SA03n2957:2494: tava pādapadyayorabhi saṁbodhane 'dhīnayā dhiyā samyagnirūddhamāntaraṁ dhvāntajātaṁ yasya |
SA03n2957:2495: ata eva samyagadhigataṁ samastavastu visaraṇaśīlamabādhitatvāt naiḥ sargikaṁ svapnamāyāmayamadvaita eva grāhyagrāhakābhāvādadvaita tattvaṁ yena |
SA03n2957:2496: akarūṇeṣu yā karūṇā tasyā balaṁ cāvāryavīryodayaśca tābhyāmārabdhayā nānāvidhayā vyāpṛtyā caryayā dhvastā mārā yena sa tathā |
SA03n2957:2500: pracite prathamaṁ ṣaḍ laghavastata ādilaghukāni trikāṇi sapta |
SA03n2957:2511: sarvadurvāramārapravīrāṇāṁ dhvajinyāḥ senāyā uddhavasyotsavasya dhvaṁse yā baddhā abhirāmāsamapraudistasyā nirvyūdayā gādo 'tyarthatīvraḥ pratāpodayo yasya sa eva vāgīśvaraḥ kumāro jayati |
SA03n2957:2513: sfārafullasthalāmbhojasya nirbhāsaṁ sādṛśyaṁ birbhati yatpādapīṭhaṁ tasyānte viśrāntaḥ kānto 'marendravyāḍendradaityendrāṇāṁ cūḍopalasya cūḍāratnasyārciścayo yasya sa tathā |
SA03n2957:2514: duḥsahoddāmaduḥkhānalena grastā ata eva paryastā vyākulā śaktiryasyāḥ sā cāsau trilokī ca tasyā viśokīkriyāyāṁ nirvirāmaśramatvādevāścaryā yā caryā tasyā nidhiḥ |
SA03n2957:2515: śuddhasaṁbuddhavaṁśasyāvataṁso bhūṣaṇaṁ tadvatprakāśate yā sfurantī kīrtitstayā kīrṇo vyāpto 'ntarālaprasāro yenāsau tathā ||
SA03n2957:2536: gādamatyarthaṁ vinigūdāśrliṣṭā dayā vismayamayī āścaryakarī apratimaraudrā ca tanuryasya tam |
SA03n2957:2540: tathā śuddhānāṁ guṇānāṁ daśabalādīnāṁ dhāma sthānam |
SA03n2957:2542: ata eta udārā nava nāṭyarasā yasya santīti matup |
SA03n2957:2562: karūṇāvaśavarti bhavadvapuḥ kasya mano na karotyupacitram || 125 ||
SA03n2957:2566: karūṇāvaśena vartituṁ śīlaṁ yasya tadidaṁ bhavato vapuḥ kasyacit draṣṭurūpacitraṁ mano na karoti |
SA03n2957:2569: kathaṁ tathā karoti yasmādabālaśaśiprabha mardha mādadhāti |
SA03n2957:2575: vṛttapakṣe idaṁ yathoktaṁ pūrvārdhamidaṁ cāparārdhamādadhadupa citramardhasamaṁ vṛttam |
SA03n2957:2577: yatra ca liṅgāntaraṁ tatra liṅgavipariṇāmena saṁbandhanīyam |
SA03n2957:2587: bhavasya saṁsārasya mathanaṁ śrutaṁ yasya bhavamathane vā śruto viditaḥ |
SA03n2957:2594: 'tvaccaraṇānucareṇa na bhāvyaṁ bhavamathanaśruta na drutamadhye iti padyālaṁkārasūtram |
SA03n2957:2595: tatra adhyā tvaccaraṇānu careṇa na na bhāvyamityarthaḥ ||
SA03n2957:2601: kimuśanti budhā adhikaṁ vibho yadi janīya tadīyatanurbhavet |
SA03n2957:2609: yadi tava dṛṣṭisudhārasadhārayā sfuritahārarūcā tadīyā teṣāṁ tanurhariṇī cāsau plutā ceti tādṛśī bhavati |
SA03n2957:2611: hāreṇāpi hṛdi sfuratā tanuḥ vimalā vyāptā ca bhavati ||
SA03n2957:2622: taveti vakṣyamāṇenābhisaṁbandhādiyaṁ tava mukhaśrīḥ puṣpitāgrā vikasitaparyantā |
SA03n2957:2627: nijadhīśriyeti tu yadi pāṭhaḥ syātsyādarthasya samīcīnatā |
SA03n2957:2639: idaṁ tava dakṣiṇaṁ mukhaṁ nīlatvādutpalaprakararūcāṁ saṁcaya iva bhāti |
SA03n2957:2640: aparaṁ ca vāmavakraṁ śuklatvāt kairavasya śriyeva samuditaṁ samutpannamīdṛśamatisundaraṁ mano harati ||
SA03n2957:2646: idamardhasamaṁ samīkṣyate te bata vṛttaṁ jayino jagattrayasya |
SA03n2957:2651: tava jagattrayajayina iyaṁ lalitāpi śiśulīlā yadya smāt |
SA03n2957:2652: kkacidarthavidhau paraprayojanasaṁpādananimittaṁ vidhūtaviśvā rūpāntareṇa kampitajagattrayā bhavati |
SA03n2957:2653: ata idaṁ vṛttamardhasamaṁ yasya tathā samīkṣyate |
SA03n2957:2661: kathamastu na viśvabhāratī nijadāsīva tava priyaṁvadā || 131 ||
SA03n2957:2666: ākrāntā jagattrayyāḥ śikhā śikharaṁ brahyāṇḍaṁ yena tādṛśaṁ te tava padamavekṣya jitasya ekapādatalākrāntarūpasya viśvasya bhāratī nijadāsīvapriyaṁvadā na kathamastu |
SA03n2957:2669: trivikramasyāpyuktarūpaṁ padamekamavalokya sarasvatī caturānanā nalinavanarājahaṁsī dāsīva priyaṁvadā saṁvṛttā ||
SA03n2957:2676: svarasopanatāṁ śamaśayyāṁ kiṁ nu vidhūya dhiyo 'pyatidurgaiḥ |
SA03n2957:2677: aticitracaritraśataiste vegavatī karūṇā yadi na syāt || 132 ||
SA03n2957:2681: yadi te tava karūṇā vegavatī duḥkhārte jagati viśvagāṇupracārā na bhavettadā śama eva śayyā śame vā śayanam |
SA03n2957:2682: tāṁ svarasopanatāṁ vidhūya aticitracaritra śataiste kim |
SA03n2957:2692: lokasya gatāpi hi smṛtiṁ te bhadraṁ bhadravirāṭtanustanoti || 133 ||
SA03n2957:2696: bhadreṇa virāja ta iti bhadravirāṭte tava tanuḥ sarvasya lokasya smṛtiṁ gatāpi smaraṇaviṣayabhūtāpi na kevalamevaṁbhūtā bhadraṁ tanoti |
SA03n2957:2700: tathā sarvāṅgīṇā sarvāvayavavyāpikā sulakṣyā suvyaktā lakṣaṇānāṁ śrīḥ saṁpattiryasyāḥ ||
SA03n2957:2711: parārtha eva paramo'rthaḥ prayojanaṁ yeṣāṁ taiḥ pavipadyakhaḍgamaṇicakrairakṣobhyāmitābhāmoghasiddhiratnasaṁbhavavairocanacihnaiḥ ketumatī tava kīrtiḥ pañcātmikasamājamaṇḍale vibhāti |
SA03n2957:2716: 'ketumatī svareṣu carame 'ṅge' iti padyālaṁkārasūtrādatra prathame pāde raseṣu carame svareṣu yatiriṣṭā |
SA03n2957:2721: caittamātra bhāvabhāji bhāvyate kka parā parārthasaṁpadīdṛśī dayāyām |
SA03n2957:2729: tadbhāji caittasvabhāvāyāṁ dayāyāṁ dayāviṣaye īdṛśī sarvākārapravṛttā parā parārthasaṁpat kka saṁbhāvyate |
SA03n2957:2731: ataḥ seyaṁ dayaiṣokta lakṣaṇā yā bhagavadākṛtistadeva cchalaṁ tataḥ |
SA03n2957:2740: ṛjunā krameṇa saṁjñāpraveśo na nirvahatīti pūrveṣāmevaiṣa vākyavinyāsaḥ |
SA03n2957:2742: tatra priyaṁvadāvegavatī bhadravirāṭketumatīnāṁ pratyekamayukpādau daśākṣarau yukpādāvekādaśākṣarau |
SA03n2957:2753: he atibhava tava tanuriyamatirūcirā satī nikhilajagadabhirūcikṛtau paṭurjayati |
SA03n2957:2755: udayaṁścāsau arūṇākiraṇaparikaro yaḥ kanakamayaḥ kanaka vikāraḥ himakaraśca tayorjayanī varṇāhlādakāritvābhyām |
SA03n2957:2761: etanmate tu prathamaḥ pādaḥ ṣoḍaśākṣaro dvitīyaḥ pañcadaśākṣara iti catuṣpadīyamati rūcirā |
SA03n2957:2762: tathā ca padyālaṁkārasūtram 'acaladhṛtiratha tithiraparamata iti yamaviratacaraṇayatiratirūcirā iti ||
SA03n2957:2778: tasyāḥ sacivānāṁ tādṛśānāṁ vimalamaṇīnāṁ nicayena khacitatvāt suparighaṭanalakṣaṇasya vasatiḥ |
SA03n2957:2779: tathā nijanayasya bodhi sattvanīteryo gadanaravastasya layo 'nutkaṭatā tasya lavaḥ |
SA03n2957:2782: parimalena miladalikulaṁ ca tasya yat kkaṇitaṁ guñjitaṁ tannidhiḥ ||
SA03n2957:2791: aparimitasukṛtafalamadhipa tava jayati sakalajinanayanayanagīrṛjumatiṣu niyatamṛjuramṛtakuṭa kuṭilamatiṣu niratiśayakuṭila padā || 138 ||
SA03n2957:2801: tatra samupanatarūciṣu vineyeṣu vividhaṁ samudayasya karaṇamupāyamabhidadhatī praśamasukhalakṣaṇe rase rasikamatiṣu nirūpamasya śamasukhapathasya kathane pṛthuniratistatparatā yasyāḥ sā tathā |
SA03n2957:2804: ṛjumatiṣu sattveṣu niyatamṛjuravakrapadā kuṭilamatiṣu tu niratiśayakuṭilapadā ||
SA03n2957:2807: pareṣāṁ khañjeti mukhyaṁ nāma kuṭilapadādyu ktayā vyākhyāyate |
SA03n2957:2810: tena tatra yau yukpādau tāvihā yukpādau yau cāyukpādau tau yukpādau ||
SA03n2957:2819: tvāṁ stuvan bhūtaguṇairabhivyāharan bhavato guṇānāmiyamākhyānikā sāmastyenākhyānamiti yo mahān manyate |
SA03n2957:2824: yadyākhyānikā na bhavati kiṁ tarhi bhavatītyāha |
SA03n2957:2833: aśeṣāṇāṁ smaravairiṇāṁ buddhānāmākhyeyatākhyātiṁ nirvacanīyatāvyapadeśamanāśriteṣu guṇeṣu yā ākhyānikāsau vṛthābhimānasya mithyābhimānino janasya viparītapūrvā ākhyānikā |
SA03n2957:2840: ete ca padyālaṁkāre upajātiprastāva eva darśite iti || ||
SA03n2957:2846: saṁprati yathoddeśaṁ viṣama vṛttau bhagavantaṁ stauti |
SA03n2957:2850: guṇasāgara sāgarairapūritāṅgurīgarto viṣamaṁ daśāntare dayāṁ padacaturūdhvaṁ nayati bhāvam || 141 ||
SA03n2957:2855: na pūrito 'ṅgurīṇāṁ garto yasya sa tava pādo 'sodaḥ sodumaśakyaḥ |
SA03n2957:2861: tasya pādasya gādamajjanādanuvṛddhairapi sumerūpariveṣṭikāḥ sapta bāhyaśca mahaudadhirityaṣṭau sāgarā iti viṣamaṁ rūpaṁ dayāṁ tava bhāvamabhiprāyaṁ nayati prāpayati |
SA03n2957:2872: laghugurūniyatibhṛti bhayamayati ko na bhavasi na yadi niyatamabhividhivacanamanu pīḍaḥ || 142 ||
SA03n2957:2876: ityanantaroktaprakāreṇa nigaditāyāṁ jātau svabhāvaviṣame tava ko na bhayamayati gacchati |
SA03n2957:2882: vineyā nurodhāt kkacillāghavaṁ ca kkacidgauravaṁ ca bibhratyām |
SA03n2957:2884: sarva eva bhayamāsādayati yadi tvaṁ niyatamabhividhivacanamanu pīḍo na bhavasi |
SA03n2957:2889: vṛttapakṣe nigaditāyāṁ padacaturūrdhvajātau kṛtaviṣamacaraṇaracanāyāmetacchlokaprastārakrameṇa laghugurūniyamaṁ dadhatyāṁ satyām |
SA03n2957:2903: viṣamajanadamanī ghaṭitā vikaṭā mūrtiryena tasya tava |
SA03n2957:2904: tripuraharasya maheśvarasya mukuṭamaṇiḥ śaśikalā tatsadṛśī daśanakalikeyaṁ bhāti |
SA03n2957:2915: te tavānantaroktarūpasya nayanasya yo valanalavo manāgāvarjanaṁ tasya līlāprasabhamabhimukhāgataṁ śamanamapi yamamapi praśamayati |
SA03n2957:2917: prasarantī urūdahanasya ghanatvāt ghorā cchaṭā yasmiṁstādṛśamanavadhi gaganaṁ kaṭākṣajvālājaṭilatvāddadhānā |
SA03n2957:2947: he īśa iyaṁ tavānantaroditarūpā tanuḥ kṛpayā kayāpyanirvacanīyayā niśamudgatā jaladarāśiṁ jayati |
SA03n2957:2954: ebhirūpamāna gatairviśeṣaṇairūpameyasya bhagavato yathāsaṁkhyaṁ praharaṇakiraṇairaujjvalyaṁ śyāmatva pīnatve pracaṇḍanibiḍāṭṭahasitaṁ ca dhvanitam ||
SA03n2957:2968: ata eva karuṇāvaśādeva anyeṣāṁ duṣkaratarāṇi vilasitaśatāni tanvatastava |
SA03n2957:2969: paṭu sfuṭaṁ kīrte ridama dbhutaṁ saurabhakaṁ saundaryaṁ parimalo vākhilaṁ lokamāhlādayati |
SA03n2957:2970: yaśo hi śubhraṁ sugandhi ceti kavisamayaḥ |
SA03n2957:2976: vṛttapakṣe udgatāyā eva tṛtīyapādasyānyathātve yathādarśite saurabhakam ||
SA03n2957:2981: damayati tava bhuvanāni vapurlalitaṁ ca kiṁ tu vikaṭaṁ yadīdṛśam || 148 ||
SA03n2957:2985: lalitaṁ ca manoharamapi tava vapurbhuvanāni damayati |
SA03n2957:2987: kiṁ tu bhṛkuṭīkaṭākṣeṇa yukteṣu daśaneṣu vikṛtāni |
SA03n2957:2992: vṛttapakṣe udgatāyā eva tṛtīyapādasya yathādarśitamanyathātve lalitaṁ nāma pūrveṣāṁ kiṁ tu yadīdṛśamato nāmnā vikaṭaṁ yujyate || ||
SA03n2957:3001: marūdanatiśayarayaḥ pracupitamapi tava na sameti salīlam || 149 ||
SA03n2957:3005: prāgbhāraḥ sumervādiparvatāvanataśikharabhāgastasyātiśayaḥ paryantastādṛśe 'pyatidurgatvāadbhutabhīme samantāt sarvato dikṣu samaṁ tulyakālaṁ bhuvanānāmahitahataye yattava salīlaṁ pracupitaṁ mandagamanaṁ tadapi |
SA03n2957:3007: kiṁ bhūyo bhagavanbhavantamāśrayamāptaḥ sthirabhāra matulamārṣabhaṁ dadhānam |
SA03n2957:3017: api ca pracayena bhūyasā kuśalasyāsya nikāmanirmalasya |
